Package com.example.cab222a.dao.user

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab222a.dao.core.AbstractObjectDAO<User>
com.example.cab222a.dao.user.UserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObjectDAO<User>
public class UserDAO extends AbstractObjectDAO<User>
DAO for the User class that handles the CRUD operations within the database.
